column4: LIttlegator:  please don't take this the wrong way, but I'd strongly advise you against installing Beryl for the moment.  Although it looks pretty sweet, it's not quite ready for prime time, and can take a fair bit of fiddling to keep it working properly and in conjunction with your other apps. Many experienced linux users don't bother with it for this reason.
Are there other apps that skin ubuntu?
all I see there is compiz, are there others?
